title: Beautiful studio w/ roof deck
description:
This beautiful studio apartment is the 3rd floor of a remodeled tri-plex in the up-and-coming neighborhood of Brewerytown. The unit is clean and comfortable. It gets a tremendous amount of natural light and comes with a private roof deck. The appliances are also fairly new - refrigerator, dish washer, stove/oven, and garbage disposal.
The building is on a nice quiet street one block from the Discovery Center (https://www.discoveryphila.org/) so there is unlimited open space very close by. The location is convenient for commuting the two miles into Center City or up to Temple University. Also, I-76 is 5-7 mins away, so it works for anyone going out of the city as well. It's also one block from a golf driving range and Kelly Drive, Philly Art Museum, Philly Zoo are all close by too.
The rent is $900 per month. There is an additional $150 charge per month for the included utilities - electric, heating, central AC, and water. Total due each month: $1,050
Must have good credit. First month, last month, + $900 security required at signing. ($3,000)

title: Light-filled 3 bedroom, 1.5 bath with patio available for rent
description:
Available for move-in immediately!
Originally built in the 1920s and completely redone in 2014/15, this well maintained 3 bedroom, 1.5 bath, wide width row home, in South Philly is a place you’ll want to come home to. Enter into the spacious wide living room area with high ceilings complete with an electric wall fireplace, giving it an extra touch of warmth on a chilly day. The dining area has room for a table to comfortably seat six guests and the half bath/powder room is off the dining area. The dining area flows into a well-appointed kitchen with plenty of soft-close doors and cabinets, granite counter workspace and Samsung appliances; it even has a coffee center built in. The unique kitchen buildout is tiered making it perfect for baking. There is a breakfast nook for a small eat in kitchen and space for stools at the breakfast bar perfect for entertaining or a place for the kids to do their homework, or just a quiet cup of coffee. The stacked washer and dryer is next to the kitchen. To extend your entertainment space, go into the backyard patio which is spacious enough for a table and chairs, a grill and small garden. The basement is partially finished in the front for a bonus hang out space. Great storage space in the back of the basement. The second floor has a bedroom/office/den at the top of the stairs and the full bath is next door off the hallway. The bedroom in the middle of the hallway is big enough for a double bed and chest of drawers and has a good size closet. The front large main bedroom’s closets were redone to provide extra space. The main bedroom is newly painted. Extra deep windows throughout. Central air, hardwood floors, and tons of light throughout make this a great space to call home. A Nest System is installed to easily control the temperature of your interior environment. Conveniently located and accessible to Center City, transportation (Right on the 17, 29, and 7 bus routes), coffee shops, restaurants, and shopping. Make an appointment to see for yourself!
Dogs up to 50lbs welcome.

title: Spacious Home for Rent in Newbold
description:
3 beds, two full and two half baths in a 1,378 SF home available December 1st!
Beautiful renovated home for rent in Newbold. The floor plan of this spacious home makes it a great option for a couple, a family or friends looking to co-share; up to four persons. The first floor is open concept with living room, dining room and updated kitchen with granite counters, stainless steel appliances and plenty of cabinet space for storage and a small powder room. A covered patio is accessed from the kitchen. Upstairs there is a main bedroom with an en suite bathroom, two additional bedrooms, and a full hallway bath. A second floor deck is accessed through the back bedroom. The washer and dryer is located on the second floor right outside the main bedroom. The basement is fully finished and complete with a bar and half bath.
Hardwood floors throughout the house. Central Air. Washer and dryer included. Great location, near coffee shops, BYOBs popping up, near subway and bus stop and walkability to Passyunk Ave. Non-smoking property. Pets not allowed.

title: Available Early January, Move in for the New Year!
description:
Available early January, move in for the New Year! Showcasing waterfront and city views from the exclusive vantage of a spacious unit in the Society Hill Towers (designed by IM Pei), this stunning two bedroom condo was designed to impress. Featuring floor to ceiling windows with custom treatments, vinyl plank wood flooring, an open concept living area, modern fixtures, and coveted building amenities including a 24 hour concierge, maintenance, as well as underground Parking, health club, and seasonal pool available for an additional monthly fee, this residence has it all. Rent includes all utilities and basic cable/ internet. Upon entry through the gracious foyer, you will be entranced by the boundless views and natural light shining through the spacious, open living and dining area. The beautiful kitchen will instantly inspire you to begin preparing meals with features such as stainless steel appliances, granite countertops, and upper and lower cabinetry. The main bedroom is complete with a walk-in cedar closet, tons of space, and stunning views of the river. The second bedroom also includes ample closet space, river views, and tons of opportunity for a home office, guest suite, and more. Tiled hall bath just off the hall and across from both of the two bedrooms. The conveniences continue with a small supermarket on site with delivery service, as well as a dry cleaners and the well regarded Zahav Restaurant. Building has a $250 move in fee, and a $50 application fee for required credit and criminal background check. The building is non smoking and restricts pets.

description:
Half a block way from Rittenhouse Square Park. Roof top deck with spectacular view of the park as seen in the photos. This rental has two generously size bedrooms (11x11 and 19x8) with two full bathrooms. A garden walkway welcomes you as you enter the property through a private gated entrance. The updated kitchen boasts granite counter tops, newer stainless steel appliances and a charming back splash. The second level offers a full bath with subway tiles and pedestal sink as well as a large bedroom (19x8) with more than ample closet space and built-in shelving - this level has plenty of natural light shining through the windows. The third level features a nicely updated full bathroom with an 11x11 bedroom and plenty of natural light. The lower level has a nice sized unfinished basement with a full-size washer and dryer (included with rental). This home is just steps from Rittenhouse Square restaurants, shops, fabulous nightlife, parking garages, public transportation and everything Center City has to offer. Schedule your private showing today. Make yourself at home with 2 very nice size bedrooms (11x11) and (19x8) each with their own full bath. title: SPECTACULAR 3 BED, 2 BATH HOME ON A TREE-LINED STREET IN FITLER SQUARE
description:
Spectacular 3 Bed, 2 Bath home on a tree lined street in Fitler Square and the GREENFIELD CATCHMENT!!!! Enter through the chic black and white brick exterior and find a freshly painted first floor highlighted by hardwood floors, an exposed brick wall and multiple windows which fill the rooms with an abundance of natural light. A two-story ceiling gives the Living Room a sense of airiness while the space maintains a cozy ambiance thanks to its brick fireplace. The Dining Room is a charming space that is well lit from warm track lighting beneath exposed beams. Walk into the kitchen and you will find plenty of cabinetry, a gas stove top and granite countertops that provide ample working space. Next to the Kitchen is a charming small Patio that is perfect for dining al fresco. Ascend the Living Room stairs to find the second floor complete with a Full Bath and a Primary Bedroom that provides ample closet space, ceiling fan and hardwood floors throughout. Two more Bedrooms and a Full Bath can be found on the third floor. The Fully Finished Basement is the perfect place to entertain guests for a football game or an enjoyable place to watch tv while folding laundry (also located in the Basement). A stoneâ€™s throw away from I-76, the Schuylkill River walk and many local shops and restaurants, 515 S 27th St. is no to be missed!

title: STUNNING, COMPLETELY RENOVATED 2 BEDROOM, 2 BATHROOM RESIDENCE!
description:
Stunning, completely renovated two bedroom, two bathroom residence located on the 19th floor of The Academy House along the Avenue of the Arts! Enter into the foyer with black tile floors and coat closet. The large eat-in kitchen has granite countertops, a peninsula, breakfast nook, modern wood cabinets, subway tile back splash and stainless steel appliances including a Frigidaire electric range, oven and microwave, a Kitchenaid refrigerator, and a Whirlpool dishwasher. The adjacent great room has hardwood floors and city views to the south and east from a private Juliet balcony which can be accessed from each room. The primary suite has great closet space and a spacious ensuite bathroom which features a shower/tub with subway tile and a double vanity. The second bedroom is spacious and also has a large amount of closet space. Directly across is the hall bathroom which has tile flooring, a contemporary glass vanity, and a shower/tub. There is a Maytag stackable washer/dryer in the unit. No detail was left undone in this showplace condominium. The terrace doors were pushed out to increase interior square footage. Residents of Academy House enjoy a 24-hour doorman and a state-of-the-art fitness and aquatic center. There is valet parking in the building's garage for an additional monthly fee, subject to availability. The Academy House is located in the heart of Center City and within close walking distance to Rittenhouse Square, Washington Square, and the Broad Street and Market Street office corridors. The Philadelphia International Airport and Amtrak's 30th Street Station are easily accessible.
1420 Locust St #19F

title: WELCOME TO BRIDGEVIEW! LOCATED IN BUSTLING OLD CITY!
description:
SHORT TERM 6 MONTH LEASE. Welcome to Bridgeview! Located in bustling Old City, on a quiet cobblestone street, is a renovated, top floor loft for you to call home. The building features high quality amenities including roof deck, garage parking, 24 hour concierge service, and a thriving association of owners. Your new home, unit 616, is bathed in natural light and features the high ceilings and exposed brick walls of your dreams. Enter the unit and find ample storage by the door before moving toward the kitchen, notice the hardwood floors throughout. You’ll first find an updated kitchen with a fresh new backsplash, stainless steel appliances and tons of storage. From here, you’ll enter the open living space with plenty of room for a dining table and living room set. Notice the size of these windows! You’ll find more closet storage on the way to the full bath that features stone tile and radiant heating in the floors. Next, is the large primary bedroom with two huge windows and more exposed brick. Another closet here for additional storage. Lastly you’ll find a BONUS room that is perfect for a nursery, home office, gym, dressing room, yoga room, guest bedroom or whatever you desire to make of it! Unit 616 comes with a 3x6 storage unit on the 6th floor (near the elevator and unit). GARAGE PARKING AVAILABLE FOR ADDITIONAL $250/ MO. Easy access to the Market Frankford Line, I-95 and the Ben Franklin Bridge make this a commuter's dream and on the evenings and weekends you are in the heart of everything that Old City has to offer including tons of boutiques, coffee shops, restaurants and museums. Don’t miss your opportunity to claim this stylish home for yourself!
315 New St #616

title: Elevator building, Beautiful courtyards, Seasonal Bike Share Program
description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. Contact a leasing agent to schedule a personal tour of our Haverford apartments.

title: Beautiful courtyards, Elevator building, Seasonal Bike Share Program
description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. The building types include Walk-Up, Courtyard and Town Houses. The buildings are a desirable two-story layout. Some of our distinctive amenities include:
Parking, On and off-Street
Garages available
High speed internet access
Three On-site Playgrounds
On-site management

24 hour emergency maintenance
overnight security
Central Air conditioning
Storage space
Day-care
Public transportation
